modifiers.text: This week was so much fun!
I loved learning in {X} this week.
I really enjoyed the content this week.
I had fun this week.
I'm really enjoying the module content.
I'm like a kid in a candy store, but the candy is knowledge.
Learning in {X} is my new favorite hobby, second only to procrastinating.
I'm on a knowledge binge and I can't stop.
Learning in {X} is my new cardio, it gets my heart pumping and my mind racing.
I'm like a detective, solving the mysteries of the universe one fact at a time.
I'm so excited to learn, I can hardly contain myself.
{X} is like a treasure hunt, and I'm the Indiana Jones of knowledge.
I'm having so much fun learning, I almost forgot it's supposed to be boring.
I'm on a knowledge high and I can't come down.
I'm having a blast, I can't believe this is actually called 'studying'
I'm having so much fun in {X}, I think I might just become a professional student.
This week was good.
I am enjoying {X} right now.
I'm optimistic that with enough studying, I'll become a genius... or at least pass the exam.
I'm hopeful that one day, all this information will click and make sense.
I'm confident that with enough learning, I'll be able to understand my lecturer when they talk.
I'm hopeful that one day, I'll be able to have a conversation about {X} without saying 'I have no idea what you're talking about'
I am feeling optimistic about {X} this week.
I think that this week went well.
Things are looking up for me in {X}.
I think I am going to do well in {X}.
My brain is like a sponge, but instead of water, it's soaking up information.
Learning is my superpower and I'm ready to flex my brain muscle.
I'm a nerd and I'm not afraid to embrace it.
I'm a brainiac and I'm loving every minute of it.
Learning is like a game, and I'm all in to win.
I'm so proud, I'm thinking about getting a tattoo of a brain to commemorate my newfound knowledge.
I'm so proud, I'm considering changing my name to 'Professor' for the rest of my life
I'm so proud, I'm thinking about starting a blog to share my newfound knowledge with the world.
I'm so proud, I'm considering becoming a walking encyclopedia, ready to spout out facts at any moment.
I am proud of what I achieved this week.
I did well this week.
I am proud of myself for achieving my goals in {X} this week.
I am proud of sticking it out this week.
I am proud of how well I did this week.
I am frustrated with the pace of learning.
I am angry about the complexity of the material in {X}.
I am irritated by {X} this week.
I am annoyed at myself for not doing more this week.
I am frustrated with the content this week.
I'm so angry, I could throw a textbook across the room.
I'm so mad, I could make a meme about it.
I'm feeling a bit annoyed at {X} at the moment.
I am frustrated with myself this week.
I could have done better in {X} this week.
I felt a bit anxious this week.
I was a bit stressed this week.
I was a bit nervous about {X}.
I was anxious, but I handled it well.
I was stressed, but I handled it well.
{X} was stressful this week.
I could have done more to deal with my stress.
Stress. Stress everywhere.
Can open, worms everywhere.
I'm 'fine'.
I need chocolate!
I need a hug!
I'm not anxious. You're anxious.
What if I told you that I'm a bit nervous?
It was a rough week.
The anxiety was real, yoh!
I didn't handle my stress well.
I was super anxious about {X}.
I'm about an 11 out of 10 on the anxiety scale right now.
Wow, things got real this week.
I was anxious, but only a bit.
I'm just a brain on the brink of a breakdown!
Learning in {X} is like trying to solve a Rubik's Cube blindfolded.
I am concerned about falling behind in {X}.
There are many topics I am unsure of.
I have a few questions.
There are some things I don't understand well enough.
I am worried about not being good enough in {X}.
I feel like an imposter in {X}.
I'm so ashamed, I could hide under a rock... or just admit I didn't study.
I feel like I'm trying to drink from a fire hose of information.
I think my brain is going to implode from all this new knowledge.
I'm pretty sure my brain just short-circuited from all this studying.
My brain is about to overload from all this new information.
Things could be worse. They could also be better.
I am feeling overwhelmed and unsure this week.
I am not sure that I'll be able to pass {X}.
I'm so hopeless, I'm considering becoming a beach bum instead of finishing {X}.
I'm convinced that I'll never understand this material, I'm ready to give up and join a cult.
I'm so hopeless, I'm considering becoming a hermit and just living off berries and roots.
I'm ready to throw in the towel and just become a professional napper instead of studying.
I'm so hopeless, I'm thinking about becoming a street performer and just guessing the answers.
I'm so hopeless, I'm considering becoming a meme and just existing on the internet forever.
I wish that banging my head against the table actually worked.
I just need to make it through this week.
I could use a motivational poster around about now.
Meh!
I was bored with the content this week.
I wish the content was more interesting.
I lost interest a bit.
This week was super boring!
Learning in {X} this week was like watching paint dry, but less exciting.
I'm pretty sure my brain is in hibernation mode from all this boredom.
I'd rather watch grass grow than sit through another video.
My brain is so bored, it's starting to play solitaire with itself.
I'm convinced that learning in {X} is just a fancy way of saying 'sitting around being bored'.
I'm so bored, I think I just became an expert in the art of doodling.
